reviews.review_msg: Good professor.  Yea, the class is a bit boring sometimes, but grow-up this is university not Disneyland.

He teaches at KPU and UBC as well, very easy marker.. 2 people missed a test and he let them re do it without ask any questions on why they missed the test. I never studied and got around 82% on each test. Hes a very nice guy and funny. Has an accent but you can easily understand him.
